title: Sacrifice - Tony Stark
body:
Pairing: Tony Stark x Reader
Prompt: “You promised you were coming home.”
Summary: The Avengers are off to defeat the titan Thanos, and things go oh so wrong
Warnings: language, angst, character death
Word Count: 300
A/N: Wrote this months before I saw IW so it’s not completely canon as to what happened

“Ms. [Y/L/N], Mr. Stark is calling.”

“Put him through, please.”

FRIDAY patched Tony through and all I heard was coughing.

“Tony?”

“Hey baby. How’s everything?”

“Fine, what’s going on over there?”

He sighed. “I’m not going to bullshit you, it’s not looking so good. This Thanos guy, he’s like nothing we’ve ever faced before. I just wanted to- Oh shit!”

The sounds over the speaker made me even more worried then I already was. “Tony?”

“I’m here. I don’t know how long I’ll be, so just remember I love you, okay?”

I had tears stinging the back of my eyes. Why was he talking this way?

“Tony, you promised me you were coming home. You are coming home, aren’t you?”

“I have to go. I love you.”

“I love you too.”

The line went dead. The silence crept upon me as I tried to distract myself. How could I possibly do that when he’s out fighting a mad titan?

Whoever survived the fight came back to New York, mentally and physically drained. Tony wasn’t part of those who came back alive. He sacrificed himself to save everyone he could.

“[Y/N], are you sure you want to be alone right now?”

“Yeah, please.”

Natasha gave me a small smile. “If you ever need to talk, you know where to find me.”

I nodded, looking out to the city skyline. Everyone was out living there lives while I stood here sulking. I knew I’d never be truly full again, as Tony took half of my heart with him.

blog.name: doctorstrangeaskblog
blog.title: Ask Doctor Strange
blog.description: Parody motivational fan made roleplay "ask blog" style for the fictional Marvel character Stephen Strange, the sassiest magician of the cosmos, NOT A DOCTOR. I DO NOT rp any innapropriate content with minors and I'll REPORT anyone I see doing so. No profit, just for fun, I'm not affiliated to Marvel or anyone, just fan made. Follow me on Twitter @drstrangefanask

summary: Doctor Strange sequel is set to be released on 2021. (Not even 100% sure, am I right?). That is 5 years after the first one....
question: Doctor Strange sequel is set to be released on 2021. (Not even 100% sure, am I right?). That is 5 years after the first one. What do you think about the concept of waiting?
answer:
It’s gonna be 2020 now I think. I think the wait is valid considering we got Stephen in Infinity War and will get him in Avengers Endgame. Marvel always makes sure to be careful to introduce every story in its time while avoiding to make the audience get tired about new characters. Doctor Strange is part of Marvel Phase 4, meaning that for now Marvel still is focusing more on Iron Man, Thor, Hulk and Captain America to spare the new heroes and keep them for the next 10 years, while the older heroes will be receiving less attention.

If we check not the Doctor Strange movie but Stephen Strange in movies and marketing, we got:

(Doctor Strange propaganda)

-Doctor Strange (nov 2016)

(Thor Ragnarok trailer with Dr Strange in it)

-Thor Ragnarok (2017)

(Doctor Strange in premium TV services)

(Doctor Strange available to buy)

(Doctor Strange on Netflix)

(Infinity War with Dr Strange in the trailer)

-Infinity War (2018)

(IW dvd and digital releases)

(IW going to Netflix)

-Avengers Endgame (2019)

(trailers about A Endgame probably with Dr Strange in it about the quantum realm at some point / my bets )

-Doctor Strange 2 (2020)

It’s almost like having Doctor Strange every year, it’s strategic if you see the patterns. If he’s not in a movie, he’s still being evidenced on trailers or streaming in TV services or in advertisements to sell the dvd or blu rays.

I really want more Doctor Strange, I bet most Marvel fans do too considering the huge success he became, always more and more, specially after IW, but honestly, I think Marvel is saving him to be a leading character in Marvel Phase 4.

He’s the 6th most favorite MCU character now and he’s just 2 years in the MCU. His toy and the Spider Man toys were the most voted ones to have a golden version (Funko), his movie still is the most expensive to buy (digital too), Benedict is a HEAVY actor (importance, fame and title /president of the british academy of arts etc) and Doctor Strange was among the top most successful origin movies EVER, so if they’re making us wait, it’s cause they want us to CRAVE the upcoming Strange movies. Iron Man took 10 years to get famous and Doctor Strange is getting super close in barely 2 years, imagine in 10.

Marvel had no problem to move the Dr Strange 2 movie to 2020 since the problem with Guardians of the Galaxy 3 (director fired), so I guess the movie was basically ready or in a very advanced step.

We will get a lot of Doctor Strange with Scott Derrickson and the Russo bros, they’re just being careful to not make mistakes like Kevin Feige made with soooo many Iron Man movies with Avenger movies one too close to another. People got a bit bored because the dates of the 5 movies were sorta close and the Cap America movies (2 and civil war) didn’t help cause they used the same action and destruction / battle in the city style of movie at ONCE. I loved them all but it got a bit tiring and the sales fell a bit, until Guardians, Ant Man and Strange with IW gave Marvel a big UP in sales because new environments, space, magic, new characters etc.

Endgame might mean goodbye to the older heroes, that’s why they’re more worried about focusing on Tony, Hulk, Thor and Cap now.

Guardians, Strange, Black Panther, Spiderman and Cap Marvel will be the new face of Marvel soon, their adventures have to be “spared” and “delayed” a bit until we say goodbye to older heroes and close certain storylines before they start new ones.

Benedict made an 8 movie contract and probably will add more movies like Robert D Junior ans Chris Evans did, so we have AT LEAST 6 more movies with Dr Strange as a main to go (like IW and his own movie). 💖

Strange had A LOT OF SCREEN TIME in IW with SpiderMan and Iron Man (the most popular), that means they’re preparing Strange as a main, or they wouldn’t be spending so much screen-time with him.

Strange is with Iron Man in so many products, and that includes advertising. Here in Fortaleza (Brazil) the most sold products are Iron Man, Doctor Strange and Spider Man. Then Cap America and Deadpool. Strange already is among the great ones and he’s just 2 years old in the MCU. Might not seem at first, but that’s a VERY GOOD SIGN.

tags: i know this isnt naruto but i am NOT making another shameful sideblog

blog.description: This blog is an automated list of the stories posted on Archive Of Our Own under the Tony Stark tag. The stories are automatically posted here from the AO3 RSS feed.

title: You're fucking strange
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BY2xnp

by dreaming_of_the_stars

“Tony. Jesus Christ man what the fuck.” Rhodey had walked into Tony’s lab, and almost walked right back out again.
“Let’s face it. This is not the worst thing you’ve caught me doing.”
“This is so not my fault!”
“Peter this was your idea.”

Words: 1296, Chapters: ½, Language: English

Series: Part 3 of based off textposts whoop

  • Fandoms: Marvel Cinematic Universe, The Avengers (Marvel Movies), Iron Man (Movies), Captain America (Movies), Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017)
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Tony Stark, Stephen Strange, Peter Parker, James “Rhodey” Rhodes, Steve Rogers, Natasha Romanov (Marvel), Clint Barton, Wong (Marvel), these are the ones who talk, i dont really want to type everyone out
  • Relationships: Tony Stark/Stephen Strange, James “Bucky” Barnes/Steve Rogers
  • Additional Tags: Ironstrange- Freeform, would you look at that more ironstrange, Fluff, no angst thats a first, peter and tony are idiots but we love them, rhodey needs a break yet here we are, wong is so fed up with stephen, friday betrays tony(in a good way tho), clints in the vents again, would you look at that a little backround stucky, could also be platonic if you want


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BY2xnp

by emilya18

With a week-long break after exams, Peter is invited to the Avengers facility in Upstate New York to train and familiarize himself with the Avengers. Over the week, he forms a sibling-type bond with the second youngest Avenger: The Scarlet Witch.

[[Tony & Steve made up after CACW and everyone is living in the new facility]]

blog.name: agentem
blog.title: Random Stuff!
blog.description: I am a human person with thoughts and feelings Feminist | she/her | anxiety disorder | emotional about lady superheroes.

summary: Avengers Academy = canon Since Jam City has announced the end of the TinyCo game “Marvel’s Avengers Academy” (Jam City purchased...
body:
Avengers Academy = canon

Since Jam City has announced the end of the TinyCo game “Marvel’s Avengers Academy” (Jam City purchased TinyCo earlier this year), I have been pretty bummed. I started the game back when it was a city-building game. There were some fun “limited events” that usually tied in with movies or TV series where the characters fought bad guys.

Then the game was revamped to be more about fighting and less about silliness. I understand a lot of people didn’t like that. I had deleted the app before this time because it actually became to large for my old iPad to run. (I only downloaded again when “Luke Cage” season two started this year; I wanted to see what nonsense Luke was up to!)

Anyway, there were a lot of fun elements to this game, things I now consider almost canon. Since some Marvel writers frequent this site, and a TON of fan writers do, I thought you all might like to consider adding these elements to your stories.

  • New York’s Hottest Club is… Club A. This is where your Avengers dance. Loki believes he is king of the dance floor and challenges just about any new recruit to a dance off. (Sadly, he’s only got white boy side-to-side moves, like most of the characters.) But Captain America can Charleston for eight hours and Squirrel Girl will call her squirrel girls onto the floor to jam with her. Club A also has a pool table that only one character can play at once. This is an ongoing mystery and defies the rules of the game.
  • King Tony and Queen Janet. Ever since Robert Downey Jr took the role, Tony Stark had been Marvel’s king. But did you know that Janet is the queen bee? She organizes all the parties, makes all the fun outfits, and will physically fight you if you talk shit about her friends.
  • The Penguins. I am not sure when the penguins began popping up as background characters. Viv Vision makes friends with them. Okoye can train them to be dora milaje. And, most importantly, you can get Penguin Falcon, who is their dad. He will lead them in a choreographed dance. Why are so many penguins hanging out with the Avengers? We don’t know. But everyone loves fucking penguins.
  • The Cheese Fridge. Tony has a whole fridge just for his cheese. The Avengers all steal from it. Cheese is delicious.
  • Punching all the Nazis. I think this one might be self-explanatory. Captain America was born to punch Nazis. SHIELD was created to stop HYDRA-nazis. So everyone at Avengers Academy was always ready to punch (or groin kick) In fact, the game left us with the sad realization that there are still Nazis left to be punched.

We have work to do, True Believers!


Additions, AvAc players? Maybe revolver with your fave screenshot?

But everyone loves fucking penguins.
  • The Cheese Fridge. Tony has a whole fridge just for his cheese. The Avengers all steal from it. Cheese is delicious.
  • Punching all the Nazis. I think this one might be self-explanatory. Captain America was born to punch Nazis. SHIELD was created to stop HYDRA-nazis. So everyone at Avengers Academy was always ready to punch (or groin kick) In fact, the game left us with the sad realization that there are still Nazis left to be punched.

We have work to do, True Believers!


Additions, AvAc players? Maybe revolver with your fave screenshot?

blog.description:
Y'all can call me A (or TrAshy lmao) | 25 | My writing is shit but get at me anyway ♡

Requests are closed!

summary: Hard To Love: Tony Stark x Reader Drabble
title: Hard To Love: Tony Stark x Reader Drabble
body:
TrAshy Says: In this house we support my sugar daddy, Anthony Edward Stark.

Warnings: Alcohol mention, glass breaking

“Tell me something that will push me away.” 

Tony looked at you, really looked at you. Your hands were balled into fists at your sides and you were staring straight at him. He knew there were tears close to forming in your eyes, but you’d never let him see you cry, not in this state anyway. You were frustrated and hurt but you stood there, head held high, challenging him. He scoffed softly and turned away from you before downing Scotch he had poured himself. He was unable to meet your gaze or do what you’d asked; he was running and he knew he was a coward for do so. 

“You just don’t get it,Y/N. You don’t understand.”
“Then help me understand! And if you can’t, you’d better give me a good reason to walk out that door because if I do, I’m not coming back.” 

You were used to seeing Tony upset or angry; it was one of the emotions he often used to mask the others he was feeling. Still, you were surprised when the glass he’d been holding suddenly hit the ground in the space between you. The impact caused it to shatter, tiny shards now littering the otherwise immaculate floors.

“I’m a screw-up, alright?! Any time I try to do anything right, I find some way to mess it up! It’s happened with the team, it happened when I was trying to protect the world, it happened with Pepper, and now..” Tony sighed and turned back to face you; he appeared tired, more tired than you’d ever seen him. “I’m not…good enough for you, Y/N. If you stay, I’ll drive you away down the line and I know I won’t be able to handle it then because I can barely stand the thought of you leaving now.”

The man standing before you right now isn’t the same one that sweet-talked you into having dinner with him when you first met. Tony is honestly broken, his pieces lying there on the ground much like the glass shards that separate you. You carefully make your way to him and when you do, you wrap him in your arms. He all but collapses into your embrace, his arms securing themselves around your waist. 

“Underneath it all, buried under your suit and genius intellect, you’re human. Even people with the best intentions make mistakes, Tony; sometimes more often than those that wish to do harm. That doesn’t make you a screw-up, it doesn’t mean you stop fighting for what’s right, and it certainly doesn’t mean you get to push me away. I’m here, with you, because I want to be. Because I believe in you. I don’t know what the future holds, but I’m here now and I’m not going anywhere.”

You take Tony’s face in between your hands and move his head so that you can look at him. You notice a stray tear about to fall as his eyes meet your gaze, but you quickly wipe it away. The kiss Tony places on your lips is riddled with emotion; frustration, sadness, optimism, and love. When you pull away, he rests his forehead against yours and you exhale softly. 

“Let’s clean this up and go to bed.”
